actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Crop Insurance Act: (1) to change its title to the "Federal Commodity Insurance Act"; (2) to change the agency's name to the Federal Commodity Insurance Corporation; (3) to extend commodity insurance to all counties of the United States and to all commodities; and (4) to require the Corporation to pay 50 percent of the premium cost of the commodity insurance issued to any individual under the provisions of this Act. Removes the $12,000,000 ceiling on annual appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act.
